tequila.name: Lovely Rita
tequila.description: Named after the Beatles song, this drink is as fiery as John Lennon’s vocals. This spicy and smoky margarita is well balanced, fruity, and citrusy. This drink will have you singing “Lovely Rita, meter maid, nothing can come between us”

tequila.name: Spring in Japan
tequila.description: Inspired by Japanese cherry blossoms, the freeze dried raspberries mimic the appearance of cherry blossom petals on snow. This beautiful and balanced cocktail is perfectly enjoyed all year round. It has forward flavours of dark fruits balanced with lemon and ginger tea syrup

tequila.name: Red Rita
tequila.description: This well-balanced mix of sweet and cozy spices, with a hint of tartness from the cranberry juice. This cocktail is a flavorful and enjoyable option for any occasion.

tequila.name: Cloud 9
tequila.description: This cocktail will have you on cloud 9, it is crushable and delicious.

rum.name: Slamma Jamma
rum.description: It’s a perfect balance of tropical sweetness and spiced complexity, offering a refreshing and adventurous flavor profile. Enjoy a mini vacation in a glass with every sip.

rum.name: Pineapple Mojito
rum.description: This cocktail is a lively and invigorating sip of the tropics, perfect for a relaxing escape.

rum.name: Strawberry Rhubarb Dark & Stormy
rum.description: We love a twist on a classic cocktail, this fruity spin on a dark & stormy is light an refreshing. Perfect for summer nights.

whiskey.name: English TEAser
whiskey.description: This refreshing and fruity cocktail is a delightful concoction that embodies the spirit of a sunny summer day, making it the perfect choice for a vibrant and sparkling sip.

whiskey.name: Autumn Sour
whiskey.description: This apple forward spin on a classic whiskey sour is bound to be a crowd pleaser. Inspired by fall flavours, this drink is cozy and inviting.

whiskey.name: Elderflower Sour
whiskey.description: This whiskey sour is floral and savoury, with the thyme syrup balancing the floral notes of the elderflower liqueur.

whiskey.name: The Clementine
whiskey.description: This spirit forward cocktail was inspired by our cat is a sip of mystery and elegance in every glass.

whiskey.name: The Wilfred
whiskey.description: Named after our airedale terrier, although he lacks sophistication, this cocktail does not. With forward notes of earl grey tea and citrus, you’ll feel like you’re sipping pure elegance.

whiskey.name: Mulled Wine Old Fashioned
whiskey.description: A winter inspired twist on a classic using homemade mulled wine syrup, adding warm spices to the old fashioned that you already love.

whiskey.name: What A Pear
whiskey.description: For the pear lover, this cocktail offers a balance of herbal complexity with autumn spices and a citrus finish.

vodka.name: Fall Embrace
vodka.description: The fall embrace is perfect for those cool evenings, with warm flavours of chai, cinnamon, and nutmeg.

vodka.name: Summer Heat
vodka.description: This is a light and citrusy cocktail with a spicy kick that perfectly captures the essence

brandy.name: Don't know yet
brandy.description: This exquisite cocktail is a blend of rich, fruity, and zesty flavors with a touch of aromatic spice. It’s a sophisticated and well-balanced libation that’s sure to captivate your palate.

gin.name: Spring Garden
gin.description: This bright refreshing cocktail encapsulates the essence of spring. The herbal, floral notes transport you to a blooming garden.

gin.name: Sweet Tooth
gin.description: A delightful indulgence for those with a sweet tooth. This cocktail offers a harmonious blend of flavors that will satisfy your cravings

gin.name: Rose-Berry Fizz
gin.description: Is a lively and refreshing cocktail with a touch of herbal charm, an ideal choice for those who enjoy a fruity and effervescent experience.
